mapper.insert: merge into daily using dual on (daily.cid = #{cid} and daily.pid = #{pid} and daily.dt = #{dt}) when matched then update set cnt = #{cnt} when not matched then insert (cid, pid, dt, cnt) values (#{cid}, #{pid}, #{dt}, #{cnt})

insert all
into daily values (#{vo.cid}, #{vo.pid}, #{vo.dt}, #{vo.cnt})
select * from dual

insert into daily
select cycle.cid, cycle.pid, cal.dt, cycle.cnt from cycle, (select to_char(to_date( #{ym} || '01', 'yyyyMMdd') + (level-1), 'yyyyMMdd') as dt, to_char(to_date(#{ym} || '01', 'yyyyMMdd') + (level-1), 'd') as day from dual connect by level <= last_day(to_date(#{ym}, 'yyyymm')) - (to_date(#{ym}, 'yyyymm')-1)) cal where cycle.day = cal.day
